title: China’s Xi consolidates power, targets Taiwan
description: Ian Bremmer, founder of the Eurasia Group, joins Chuck to talk about Xi Jinping’s internal political challenges and China's increasing hostility towards Taiwan.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
